name: Aria Bluefin:
text: Hi, I am Aria Bluefin. I saw you two collecting garbage effectively. Can you collect 40 garbage in order to save our habitat?

name: Zed:
text: We are trying to save the sea by collecting garbage. So you donâ€™t have to beg for our help.

name: Aria Bluefin:
text: Really? We merfolks are very thankful for your kindness. Is there any way that I can help you two?

name: Deemo:
text: How about information? Did you recently see any strange objects in the ocean?

name: Aria Bluefin:
text: Now that you mention it, I encountered a very hot object in some parts of this area.

name: Deemo:
text: Hot? Maybe it is a part of my spaceship and landed recently. Thank you for your guidance.

name: Aria Bluefin:
text: May Neptune bless the journey of you two.
